sentences.sContent: You have spilled gravy on the tablecloth.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have spilled gravy on the tablecloth.
sentences.sCn: 你把肉汁泼到台布上了。

sentences.sContent: She dribbled salt all over the tablecloth.
sentences.sContent_eng: She dribbled salt all over the tablecloth.
sentences.sCn: 她把台布上撒得到处是盐。

trans.tranOther: a cloth used for covering a table
